item.title: Setup tailwindcss 2.0.1 for your projects
item.description: In this tutorial, I will explain the setup for tailwindcss 2.0.1. I found the official documentation is hard to follow and Adam’s YouTube video kind of outdated. First, create a directory with your project name, here I created a project named tailwind-helloworld. mkdir tailwind-helloworld Run the npm command - npm init -y to create a package.json with defaults. Install tailwindcss and deps with the command npm install tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer postcss-cli
